  • Method Details

    • GenerateMove

      public static Node GenerateMove(Node root, int QueenColor, int turn)
      EFFECTS : generates all possible legal actions from action factory and then calculates the utility score for each. then chooses the maxuim from the deepest node using a depth first search and extracts which move was made and returns a sender object for the game client.
      Parameters:
      root - : the game state Node that the game is currently in
      QueenColor - : which Queen/Team are we generating moves for
      Returns:
      Node that is chsen and filled with move infomation

    • sendPackageToServer

      public static void sendPackageToServer(ygraph.ai.smartfox.games.BaseGameGUI ui, ygraph.ai.smartfox.games.GameClient client, ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> contentPackage)
      EFFECTS : is the package sender. that sends packages to the server
      Parameters:
      ui - : is the GameBaseGUI reference to update the client GUI
      client - : is the server Package reference we want to ship to
      contentPackage - : the content being the old queen position new queen position and arrow in that order to be sent to GUI and client server.

    • CalcUtilityScore

      public static Node CalcUtilityScore(ArrayList<Node> chioces, Node root, int color)
      EFFFECTS : from the root applies heuristics and Monte-cCrlo through the Node
      Parameters:
      chioces - : all the children of the root
      root - : the original state and Parent

    • calcUtil

      public static double calcUtil(Node n, int color)
      Calculates a single Nodes utility score for a particular team
      Parameters:
      n - : target node to calculate
      color - : color of team
      Returns:
      utility score

    • decoupleUnusedChildren

      public static void decoupleUnusedChildren(Node chosenMove, ArrayList<Node> chioces, Node root)
      EFFECTS : decouples all choices from root that were not the chosen node to make a move on. to prevent potential memory leaks.
      Parameters:
      chosenMove - : move picked to send to client
      chioces - : all the children of root
      root - : the initial game state node

    • decoupleAllChildren

      public static void decoupleAllChildren(Node root)
      Removes all children from parent node
      Parameters:
      root - : parent node to children want to be removed

    • setSenderObj

      public static ArrayList<ArrayList<Integer>> setSenderObj(int[] oldQ, int[] newQ, int[] arrw)
      Transforms our data that contains a move into a format that server can read
      Parameters:
      oldQ - : old queen position
      newQ - : the move made
      arrw - : new arrow position
      Returns:
      list a of lists that server can read.
